Translations.Text: Ih, i wid iwumi ddment lmalayek leôwaê, u densen iman nnsen, ad inint: "anida tellam"? A d inin: "nella d uôhifen di tmurt". Ad inint: "day ur tewsiâ ara tmurt n Öebbi, a ppinigem degs"? Widak, axxam nnsen d Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
Kkes ed uôhifen, argaz, tameîîut, agrud, ur nezmir i tsensert, ur nepwanhu s abrid
Widak, amar Öebbi ad asen Isemmeê. Öebbi Izga Ipqili, Ipsemmiê

Win iunagen deg ubrid n Öebbi, ad iaf, di tmurt, aîas n ssôanat akked lufa. Win iff$en seg uxxam is, d iminig ar Öebbi akked Umazan iS, sinna, temmuger it tmeppant, arraz is atan ar Öebbi. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
